channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk® View Site Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk® View Site Edition

item.title: CVE-2023-46289|2023-10-27T18:28:40.936Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%C2%AE%20view%20site%20edition
item.description: Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk View Site Edition insufficiently validates user input, which could potentially allow threat actors to send malicious data bringing the product offline. If exploited, the product would become unavailable and require a restart to recover resulting in a denial-of-service condition.
